channel.title: Logs on PrestaShop Specs
channel.description: Recent content in Logs on PrestaShop Specs

item.title: View logs
item.description: Severity levelsIn this section the meaning of the logs is shown. 4 levels are presented Meaning of severity levels: Informative only, green coloured Warning - colored yellow Error Major issue (crash!) Settings wheel Erase all When clicking on the Erase all, a modal asks if you are sure to delete it, after clicking “OK” deletes all the logs, if pressed “Cancel”, closes the modal. Refresh list After clicking on it, the page is reloaded.
